William Reiniess

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Riner
  2. Foster Name: Unknown
  3. Foster Family: E. A. VanDyke
  4. Location of Family: Webster County, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Southern Tier Orphan's Home
  6. Arrival Place: Red Cloud, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: 1870-10-16, Elmira, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1949-01-28, Omaha, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: The Red Cloud Chief, 4 December 1979; www.genforum.geneology - for Orphans who Came to Red Cloud 1879-1880.
